rooms.description: Large open space with a central hearth and ample seating arrangements, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side.
Cozy dining space adjacent to the living room with traditional Chettinad motifs in decor.
Fully equipped kitchen with an island counter and floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light.
Two-car garage with integrated storage spaces and a small utility area.

openings.description: Double-height main entrance with glass panels and a decorative archway, aligning with Vastu's east entry.
Spacious balcony overlooking the garden with floor-to-ceiling windows for both bedroom areas.
Elegant split-level stairs connecting ground and first floors, designed in Chettinad style.

other_features.description: Layout designed to accommodate irregular plot shape with natural flow and space utilization.
Design elements aligning with Vastu principles such as entry direction, room orientation, and lighting.
